section.p: You come to a farmer's cottage. If you have the codeword Eclipse, immediately. If not, read on.
The farmer hurries out to greet you. 'Help me, mighty adventurer,' he cries, pointing to the roof of his cottage.
You see several small, spindly figures laughing and playing on his thatched roof, tearing up the thatch, and pulling out the wooden slats. They are spriggans, mischievous little sprites.

choices.choice: Lay out a jug of faery mead if you have some
Ignore the farmer and carry on
